articles.author: Tim Zadorozhnyy
articles.title: EU proposes 'powerful' 20th Russia sanctions package with full ban on oil maritime services - The Kyiv Independent
articles.description: "The new package of sanctions covers energy, financial services, and trade," European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said.
articles.content:
The European Commission proposed a new 20th package of sanctions against Russia on Feb. 6 for its war against Ukraine, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen announced.
